about_me_paragraphs: My name is Guylian Gilsing. I'm an enthousiastic student that has an interest in beautiful frontends and complex backend. In my spare time I usually can be found in a theme park, practicing card magic, watching a movie or tv show, or I'm programming.
my_knowledge_paragraphs: Next to my proficiency of HTML5, CSS3, and basic Javascript, I'm also proficient with PHP and the Vue.js frontend framework. I am able to use Docker and Github Actions to create a basic CI/CD pipeline.
